title: disapearing subway thread?
content:
from yesterday... where’d it go?

I couldn’t find it, so I went to the history and clicked the link there and before me very eyes the link turned into a... [different link](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024061050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50677).

Just - you know, wondering.

 [‹ How do you make amateur photos look good in a professional publication?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024061050/http:/typophile.com/node/50801 "Go to previous forum topic") [How do designers draw simple maps AND respect copyright? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024061050/http:/typophile.com/node/50673 "Go to next forum topic")
author: russellm
